Latin-1 Encoded Document

This document uses Latin-1 (ISO-8859-1) encoding.

Special characters: café, résumé, naïve
Accented letters: àáâãäå èéêë ìíîï òóôõö ùúûü
Currency: £ ¥ ¢
Copyright: © ®
Fractions: ¼ ½ ¾
Other: ± × ÷ § ¶

The parser should detect Latin-1 encoding and convert properly.

This tests encoding detection for non-UTF8 files.
